% Part 2

\section{Neural Network}\label{nn}

\begin{minipage}{0.45\linewidth}\label{ann}
\begin{figure}[H]
\centering
\caption{Artificial Neural Networks}
\includegraphics[width=3in]{nn}
\end{figure}
\end{minipage}

\vspace{0.2in}

Neural Networks ~\ref{ann} are really good at pattern detection.
Some would say they are better than ~\ref{svm} ( see ~\ref{svmm} ).

\section{Support Vector Machines}\label{svm}

Support Vector Machines ~\ref{svm} are a tool used in machine learning.
Some would say they are better than ~\ref{nn} ( see ~\ref{ann} ).

\begin{minipage}{0.45\linewidth}\label{svmm}
\begin{figure}[H]
\centering
\includegraphics[width=3in]{svm}
\caption{Support Vector Machine}
\end{figure}
\end{minipage}

\section{Natural Language Processsing}\label{nlp}
\begin{minipage}{0.45\linewidth}\label{tbl}
\begin{table}[H]
\centering
\begin{tabular}{c|l}
Option & Description\\
\hline
H & ``Put the figure HERE!''\\
h & ``Put the figure here, please.''\\
t & ``Put the figure at the top of the page.''\\
b & ``Put the figure on the bottom of the page.''\\
p & ``Put the figure on a special page at the end for figures.''\\
\end{tabular}
\caption{Options for Figures and Tables}
\end{table}
\end{minipage}

\vspace{0.2in}

The preceding table ~\eqref{tbl} was not written by me, it was copied. It's content are relevant to code that was used in ~\eqref{nn} which contains ~\eqref{ann}.
